verbs.description: [ARG0: Cambridge Analytica] [V: whistleblower] Christopher Wylie told House Democrats that Steve Bannon , President Donald Trump ’s former adviser , was behind much of the company ’s early focus on promoting public discontent to influence U.S. elections .
